this might be confusing but bare with me here, when opening a normal hex-tech chest there is a "roll" (a chance) that you will get a gem stone or exclusive skin, now instead in these crates etc there is 3 rolls instead of 1, with each roll 50% more likely to drop one of the aforementioned pieces of loot
So in a nutshell funder pants saying that the odds of getting gemstones or exclusive skins are tripled
